comment.body:
It seems that it's caused by `Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List`, so please add this rule:
```adblock
||tags.tiqcdn.com/utag/iberostar/main/prod/utag.js$script,redirect=noopjs,domain=booking.iberostar.com
```
to user rules.

@ryanbr Could you please take a look?
It might be necessary to wait few seconds to reproduce it.

comment.body:
Blue banner on the bottom is not blocked, because that's the way to log in.
We blocked it in the past, but there were reports about incorrect blocking - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/134187#issuecomment-1314168945
you can use this rule for bottom bar:
` twitter.com##div[data-testid="BottomBar"]`
Login popup cannot be hidden, as it is part of the functionality of the site.
